articleTitle: Die Box-Welt trauert: Ex-Weltmeister und Ali-Bezwinger gestorben
articleTitleTranslated: The boxing world mourns: ex-world champion and Ali conqueror died
articleContent: Leon Spinks hatte zuletzt gegen verschiedene Krebserkrankungen gekämpft. 1978 gewann er überraschend gegen Muhammad Ali.
articleContentTranslated: Leon Spinks had recently fought against various cancers. In 1978 he surprisingly won against Muhammad Ali.
